creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: Nude woman stands with chin down, and holds a cloth around her waist; silver metal frame, linen wrapped mat
provenance: Bruce B. and Ruth Dayton, Wayzata, Minn. (until 2010; given to MIA)
signed: signed in pencil, LL corner: M (in circle)
text: Aristide Maillol had a longstanding love-affair with the female form. In his hands women become not so much idealized as generalized to become emblems of sensuous femininity.
title: Standing Female Nude Facing Right
